school_name: University of Toronto - St. George Campus
comments: This was the absolute worst teacher I have had in University. He spoke down to his students, he was boring, he lacked any social skill what-so-ever, and his readings were ridiculous. Clawing your eyes out would be less painful than sitting through a year in his class.

school_name: University of Toronto - St. George Campus
comments: Amazing and passionate professor. he clearly cares about what he is teaching and is very organized and clear and the material is still challenging for an introductory course. Highly recommend this professor.

school_name: University of Toronto - St. George Campus
comments: Professor Langins is interesting, engaging, and very clear and well-prepared. He posts lecture outlines on Blackboard in advance of the class, and is almost always perfectly on point. He has a wide breadth off knowledge not limited to engineering or history of technology. I\'ve taken two of his classes, and I would highly recommend him.
